faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle EBS R12 SCM Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle EBS R12 SCM Training covers key modules such as Inventory Management, Order Management, and Purchasing. These modules are designed to equip you with in-demand skills for managing end-to-end supply chain operations using Oracle EBS R12. A detailed syllabus is available in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are held from Monday to Saturday, with 1-hour classes each day. This schedule ensures consistent learning and hands-on experience with Oracle EBS R12 SCM.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend-only batches. All sessions are scheduled from Monday to Saturday to ensure continuity in the learning process.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for learners who prefer self-paced study. However, please note that these sessions do not include live doubt-clearing support.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internship opportunities are available based on performance in mock evaluations. These internships offer real-time exposure to Oracle EBS R12 SCM modules and hands-on project experience.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle EBS R12 SCM Training is offered as a complete package. We do not offer individual modules separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer end-to-end resume assistance tailored to Oracle EBS R12 SCM roles, helping you highlight relevant skills, certifications, and project experience.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a laptop or desktop is required to access Oracle EBS applications and complete hands-on tasks during the training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. The course is beginner-friendly and designed to start from the basics of Oracle EBS R12 SCM. A basic understanding of supply chain concepts is helpful but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We begin with foundational concepts and progress to advanced features of Oracle EBS R12 SCM, making it suitable for both beginners and professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete placement support including mock interviews, resume optimization, and interview guidance. Our training prepares you for roles in Oracle EBS SCM across various industries.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle EBS Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist with certification preparation by providing practice questions, study materials, and expert guidance to help you succeed in Oracle EBS certification exams.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all session recordings will be available for 1 year. We also provide in-depth study materials, including real-time process documents and step-by-step guides with screenshots.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide module-wise interview questions and conduct mock interviews to prepare you for job interviews in Oracle EBS SCM roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 4 months of Oracle EBS R12 SCM practice instance access. Please note that installation is required on your system to access the EBS application. We provide complete guidance and support during the setup process to ensure you can practice effectively.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, with your 1-year course access, you can rejoin any upcoming batch of Oracle EBS R12 SCM training at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon successful completion, you will receive a Course Completion Certificate in Oracle EBS R12 SCM from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, this is a functional course focused on business processes and application configuration. No coding is required.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 1-on-1 personalized training sessions upon request. Pricing will vary from our standard group training batches.
